name: influencer-platform
description: A modern influencer marketing platform built with Bulma CSS
author: Bloggrs Team

scripts.content: document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { const $navbarBurgers = Array.prototype.slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('.navbar-burger'), 0); $navbarBurgers.forEach(el => { el.addEventListener('click', () => { const target = el.dataset.target; const $target = document.getElementById(target); el.classList.toggle('is-active'); $target?.classList.toggle('is-active'); }); }); });

meta.name: description
meta.content: Connect with top Instagram influencers for your brand marketing campaigns
